title: Shire opens $1B plant to make rare disease drugs
author: Eric Palmer
description: Shire's $1 billion plasma fractionation plant in Georgia has gone through three owners already since it was envisioned and will soon have a fourth. | Shire's $1 billion plasma fractionation plant in Georgia has gone through three owners already since it was envisioned and will soon have a fourth. But after six years, it is now officially open.
